title: How does remote learning work for teachers? - Quora

response.answer_text: Remote learning requires a well-thought strategy and planning implementation to produce the desired result. Mobile technology is one of the key factors that drive remote learning and distance education and provides high advanced mediums that simplifies remote education. Also, cloud technology solutions like mobile device management for education are an example of good assistive tools that helps teachers to manage remote learning and provide uninterrupted learning solutions. MDM for education is cloud technology-based SaaS tools that provide a centralized platform for students to manage students learning devices and secure educational data and information ensuring its safe and productive use.
